# Runtime Settings Schema

> Documentation for Runtime Settings Schema.

- [<add> Element for <namedCaches>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/add-element-for-namedcaches.md): Learn more about: <add> Element for <namedCaches>
- [<alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy> Element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md): Learn more about: <alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy> Element
- [AppContextSwitchOverrides Element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appcontextswitchoverrides-element.md): Learn more about the AppContextSwitchOverrides element that defines switches used by AppContext to provide an opt-out mechanism for new functionality.
- [<appDomainManagerAssembly> Element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md): Learn more about: <appDomainManagerAssembly> Element
